alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 01 at 1:47PM CST until December 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Marion, Boone County Except Southwest, Newton County Higher Elevations, Searcy County Lower Elevations, Boone County Higher Elevations, Newton County Lower Elevations, Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations and Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
